explains: adv. 随意地，任意地；武断地，专横地

sentences.en: Citizenship and Immigration Services will charge the applicants arbitrarily.
sentences.cn: 公民和移民服务部门会任意收费。

sentences.en: While sending flowers as gifts, we can't choose flowers arbitrarily, because different flowers may carry different meanings.
sentences.cn: 送花的时候，我们不能随意选择，因为不同的花可能有不同的含义。

sentences.en: The victims were not chosen arbitrarily.
sentences.cn: 这些受害者不是被随意选的。
